data.title: MediaCoder
data.meta_description: MediaCoder Download for Windows PC. 100% Safe and Secure Free Download 64-bit Latest Version 2024. Codecs, Multimedia
data.text:
MediaCoder had been around since 2005, and since then, has provided individuals and even professionals the best tools for media transcoding. It features optimized transcoding and accelerated processes, so you’re workflow will be much faster and efficient. Customize how methods work and adjust elements of media transcoding. If you want the best transcoding experience available, get MediaCoder now!

Advantage of using MediaCoder

Experience next-generation media transcoding with MediaCoder. It supports GPU acceleration, so processes so media encoding will be much faster on your computer. Experience professional-level media transcoding with features such as batch processing and audio/video files compatible with phones and mobile devices. Besides, it supports conversion for both web videos and high-fidelity audio files.

Key Features

CONVERT INTO POPULAR AUDIO AND VIDEO FORMATS WITH VARIOUS TRANSCODING PARAMETERS

PARALLEL PROCESSING AND H.264/H.265 GPU ACCELERATION SUPPORT

SEGMENTED VIDEO ENCODING

BUILT-IN AUDIO AND VIDEO FILTERS

RIP FILES FROM BD/CD/DVD/VD, AND VIDEO CAMERAS

What can you do with MediaCoder?

Media Export Compatibility

Convert media into different formats compatible with multiple devices. MediaCoder encodes files into the best version possible. It supports all of the popular formats in varying qualities. Encoded files are compatible with phones and mobile devices, including iPhone, iPad, and iPod.

Compression and Unifying Media Formats

Unify media format within sets of exports. Confidently export media without losing quality and even enhanced fidelity. Here is the list of MediaCoder’s supported media formats:

Storage Media and Streaming

BluRay, CD, CUESheet, DVD, FTP, HTTP, RTSP, SVCD, and UDP

Container Formats

ASF, AVI, F4V, FLV, Matroska, MPEG-PS, MPEG-TS, MTS/M2TS/AVCHD, MOV, OGM, PMP, Quicktime, and RealMedia

Lossy Audio

AC-3, ADPCM, AMR, HE-AAC, MP3, mp3PRO, LC-AAC, MPEG Audio, MusePack, Opus, Vorbis, Windows Media Audio

Lossless Audio

ALAC, FLAC, Monkey’s Audio, OptimFrog, PCM, TTA, WavPack

Video

Dirac, DivX, Flash Video, H.263, H.264/AVC, H.265/HEVC, Huffyuv, MJPEG, MPEG 1/2/4, Theora, RealVideo, Windows Media Video, XviD, VP8/VP9

Media Encoding from Streams Support

Encode media from a stream or a capturing device. Rip media from different media devices such as video recorders. MediaCoder makes it easier to capture media files and convert them into compatible formats for other platforms and devices. It preserves the quality and enhances what needs to be improved.

Moreover, you can convert files optimized for web and broadcasting services. Easily encode into web compatible video formats or high-fidelity audio files without losing quality. You can also save space or optimize file size using its built-in media compression, which produces smaller exports but lossless quality.

Corrupted Files Fix and Ripping Capabilities

MediaCoder offers features for repairing and fixing partial or damaged files. If there’s an unfinished download, chances are, the content will not play ultimately. MediaCoder will repair these files so that it is playable even when incomplete. Besides, it will fix corrupted files from your computer. Drag or import files, and it will automatically identify issues and apply remedies to them. Rests assured, your files are completely safe and recoverable.

MediaCoder also has excellent media ripping capabilities. It can capture files from BD/CD/DVD/VD and even video recording cameras. File quality will be preserved and can be exported into different formats.
